Package org.ginsim.core.graph

Class GSGraphManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ginsim.core.graph.GSGraphManager
  • public class GSGraphManager
extends Object
    Manage registered graph types and handles graph creation (from scratch or through a parser). It loads GraphFactory implementations annotated as services.
    Author:
    Lionel Spinelli, Aurelien Naldi
